name: Shuyudd.GitHub.io
body:
### Welcome
This is a collection of some of my technical work related to quantitative finance. Homework sets, papers I've authored,  Python programs, and blog posts are all fair game.

### Python in Finance
We use Python in some of our classes, and here is some of my work:
* [Python Basiscs](https://github.com/shuyudd/qfrm-python/blob/master/python-basics-notebook.ipynb)

### Interactive Python Programs
I have written some simple games according to a [Cousera course](https://www.coursera.org/learn/interactive-python-1), you can try some and have fun:
* [BLACK JACK](http://www.codeskulptor.org/#user40_CvimntR3lndoXnF.py)
* [STOP THE WATCH](http://www.codeskulptor.org/#user40_KilKFx8cWQT4op2.py)
* [GUESS NUMBER](http://www.codeskulptor.org/#user40_MN79288W1deAD7m.py)
* [TABLE TENNIS](http://www.codeskulptor.org/#user40_j0T8bYgIFLXlJPX.py)
* [REMEMBER CARDS](http://www.codeskulptor.org/#user40_DmIJCVkoe1LJUMn.py)

### Papers
* Coming soon ...

### About me
I am a grad student at the University of Michigan, in the [Quantitative Finance and Risk Management](https://lsa.umich.edu/math/graduates/quantitative-finance.html) program. I did my undergraduate work in Business Administration at Shanghai Jiao Tong University. I am a big fan of animations and games, and I hope someday I can publish my own computer or phone games.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
